abstract: Procter & Gamble seeks to burnish its corporate image by expanding a campaign declaring the company to be a “proud sponsor of moms.”
snippet: Procter & Gamble seeks to burnish its corporate image by expanding a campaign declaring the company to be a “proud sponsor of moms.”
lead_paragraph: Procter & Gamble, the nation’s largest advertiser, is further expanding a campaign it introduced last year that declared the maker of household staples to be a “proud sponsor of moms.”
